::Battera::

"Oh no. You were fine. I am the one who should appologize." she 
picked up the fruit off the floor. "I keep getting in the way of 
things." She stood up and looked at Rex. She smiled warm smile at 
him. "But it was very nice of you to come and see me."
She looked at the fruit for a second. "eh, want some?" she cuckled as 
she held out the bowl.



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:

> ::Rex::
> 
> Rex looks at the fruit, watching as Battera bends down to pick it 
up. He 
> sighs.
> 
> "I want to apologize for my behaviour on the bridge," he says to 
her, "I 
> shouldn't have acted that way. Even in front of a potential threat."
